name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.recordSearch
script:
start:
  await/type:
    form:
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_record_type:
          label: Record Type:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.record.types
              inputs:
          limit: 15
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: yes
              filtering@bool: yes
            columns:
              selection/uri:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/label_singular:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes

  return:
    snippet@text:
      {% set record_uri = prompt_record_type %}
      record.search/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        output: results_{{record_uri}}
        inputs:
          # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/commands/record.search/
          record_type: {{record_uri}}
          # [TODO]: Set `record_query:` and `record_query_params:`
          #record_query: id:${example}
          #record_query_params:
          #  example: 123
            
        #on_simulate:
        #on_success:
        #on_error:
